affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "COL3" );

	task ( "warn2" )
	{
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "COL3_035" );
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/col3/peterson/warn02.mp3" );
	}

	do ( "warn2" );
	wait ( 4000.000 );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	use ( "go_dist_check3" );
}
